description: Certified models meet all ENERGY STAR requirements as listed in the Version 6.1 ENERGY STAR Program Requirements for Televisions that are effective as of  June 1, 2013. A detailed listing of key efficiency criteria are available at https://www.energystar.gov/index.cfm?c=tv_vcr.pr_crit_tv_vcr.

name: ENERGY STAR Certified Televisions
